# Base Conversion
========================================================

## Task 1

toBase(Z,b)
return(written expression of integer in that base)
```{r}
toBase <- function(z,b){
  z <- z
  sofar <- c() 
  repeat {
    r <- z%%b
    sofar <- c(r,sofar)
    z <- (z-r)/b
    if (z == 0)
      break
  }
  return(as.character(sofar))
  }
```

Test Statements
```{r}
toBase(z=10,b=2)
toBase(z=100, b=3)
toBase(z=1000, b=16)
```
